WELCOME TO THE COWORKING CONNECTION Thank you for signing up for the inaugural Coworking Connection. I'm Dave Putt, VP Client and Consultant Services at MBO Partners, and each month, my team will share content that helps educate self-employed workers on topics that matter to them. This month, we focused in the Affordable Care Act, creating this handout <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Coworking_Connection_ACA-Handout.pdf> you can share with any self-employed workers that are interested in learning more about the ACA.
If you or your membership have any further questions about the healthcare law or being self-employed, please email me <mailto:communications@mbopartners.com>. I look forward to hearing from you! INDEPENDENTS AND THE AFFORDABLE CARE ACT - DOWNLOAD THE GUIDE TODAY America's new healthcare law raises many questions for the self-employed. Which parts apply to independents? Will they need to change their coverage? To help answer these and other basic questions about the ACA, MBO Partners has created a downloadable guide you can use to learn more about the healthcare law.
